The balance amount after collecting Rs. 1 per kg from
the applicable SCL of Rs. 300 per kg on importation
of Desiccated Coconuts by the Government owned
B.C.C. Lanka Limited up to a total of 13,000 MTs per
month on the recommendation of the Secretary of
the Ministry of Industries was waived off for a period

of three months (Extraordinary Gazette Notification 
No. 2225/8).
SCL was increased to Rs. 50 per kg from Rs. 15

per  kg  for  a  period  of  six  months  (Extraordinary 
Gazette Notification No. 2225/13).
